====== Thread ======
Created Sunday 24 November 2013

1.
					new Thread(){
				@Override
				public void run() {
					// TODO Auto-generated method stub
					super.run();
				}
			}
2. 
			   	 Runnable runnable =new Runnable() {
			
			@Override
			public void run() {
				// TODO Auto-generated method stub
				
			}
		};
				   new Thread(runnable);
				
3.
